pages.text: $(bred)Jalapeno Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie with Jalapeno's head.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)44$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will explode and $(bred)deal deadly damage to all enemies in cross flame$() when death, unless it has $(baqua)cold or frozen$() effect. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
